name: NdmsMeasuredValues
title: Measured Values in NDMS Project
description: A Code System for Populations in Measures for NDMS Project

concept.definition: Total number of all Inpatient and outpatient beds, including all staffed,ICU, licensed, and overflow (surge) beds used for inpatients or outpatients
Total number of all Inpatient and outpatient beds that are occupied
Total number of all Inpatient and outpatient beds that are available
Total number of all Critical Care beds
Total number of all Critical Care beds that are occupied
Total number of all Critical Care beds that are available
Total number of all Medical/Surgery beds
Total number of all Medical/Surgery beds that are occupied
Total number of all Medical/Surgery beds that are available
Total number of all Psychiatry beds
Total number of all Psychiatry beds that are occupied
Total number of all Psychiatry beds that are available
Total number of all Burns beds
Total number of all Burns beds that are occupied
Total number of all Burns beds that are available
Total number of all Pediatrics beds
Total number of all Pediatrics beds that are occupied
Total number of all Pediatrics beds that are available
Total number of all Pediatric ICU beds
Total number of all Pediatric ICU beds that are occupied
Total number of all Pediatric ICU beds that are available
Total number of all Negative pressure / isolation beds
Total number of all Negative pressure / isolation beds that are occupied
Total number of all Negative pressure / isolation beds that are available
Total number of all Non-Mapped beds that are occupied
